about_the_game: The story of White Moon's girlhood. She is introverted and cowardly, her parents are always quarrelling and divorcing, and she has been enduring loneliness and neglect and bullying intentionally or unintentionally. White month has always felt that this is their own mistakes, because her character led to everything. She was envious of her childhood friend Zhou. She was envious that she had many elders who were willing to pamper her and friends who were willing to play together. She was envious of her neighbor Su Youhuang's family's harmonious family environment, she envies the little friend Tang Yiren who plays together to say what he wants to say. As she grew up, everyone's family went through huge changes. It was only then that she realized that everyone had their own unhappy life. The people she envied were actually envious of her, envious of her.

name: Misanthropy
